body_html: @JulienSiems The PR you referred was only documentation change. The first argument name change is not as big as this one. A longer warning period before removal would be more appropriate, e.g. remove when it gets to next major release.
body_text: @JulienSiems The PR you referred was only documentation change. The first argument name change is not as big as this one. A longer warning period before removal would be more appropriate, e.g. remove when it gets to next major release.
